Write a function poly that calculates the values of a polynomial with the given coefficients at the given value of x, ie, evaluate $$f(x) = \sum_i \textrm{coeffs}_i ~ x^i$$ print(l) def poly(coeffs, x): #0given total = !BLANK #blank test #1given for power, coeff in enumerate(coeffs): !BLANK = total + coeff * (x ** power) #2given return total #1given
